steps.name: Given I am login on staging env by created timestamp project
Debug step:
When I navigate to menu "Mobile app" with submenu "Mobile Editor"
Then I should see Mobile screen display
When I select tab name Pages with index 1
When I add new screen with name JIT025PreviewCode
Then I should see the screen with name JIT025PreviewCode display in list Pages
When I select screen with name JIT025PreviewCode
When I select tab list with name "Layers"
When I open Search popup on item value "JIT025PreviewCode" with index "1"
When I add item "Text" without inputting in Search popup to preview mobile editor
When I open preview code with component mode
Then I should see the code contains "<Text style={styles.text_1}>{'[text]'}</Text>"
When I close preview code panel
When I toggle on item value "Page" with index "1"
When I select item value "Text" with index "1"
When I toggle off Layout tree header
When I update field label "Text" of header "Text" with value "JITERA"
When I select dropdown field label "Font Family" of header "Text" with value "Default"
When I select dropdown field label "Font Weight" of header "Text" with value "bold"
When I update field label "Size" of header "Text" with value "30"
When I update field label "Line Height" of header "Text" with value "50"
When I select field label "Text Align" of header "Text" with radio icon has attribute aria-label "align-center"
When I select the color for field label "Color" of header "Text" by inputting the hexcode value "FF0000"
When I update field label "Letter Spacing" of header "Text" with value "20"
When I turn on the toggle button label "Letter Spacing" of header "Text" with value "italic"
When I turn on the toggle button label "Letter Spacing" of header "Text" with value "underline"
When I update field label "Width" of header "Basic" with radio "PX" and value "300"
When I update field label "Height" of header "Basic" with radio "PX" and value "60"
When I update field label "Flex" of header "Basic" with value "0.2"
When I select the color for field label "Border Color" of header "Basic" by inputting the hexcode value "#FF0000"
When I select dropdown field label "Border Style" of header "Basic" with value "solid"
When I update field label "Radius" of header "Basic" with radio "PX" and value "20"
When I update field label "Border Width" of header "Basic" with value "10"
When I select the color for field label "Background Color" of header "Background" by inputting the hexcode value "#1545AC"
When I select field label "Flex Direction" of header "Layout" with radio "column"
